item.title: First Http Email - 1991
item.description: From: timbl@info .cern.ch (Tim Berners-Lee) Newsgroups: alt.hypertext Subject: Re: Qualifiers on Hypertext links… Message-ID: 6484@cernvax.cern.ch Date: 6 Aug 91 14:56:20 GMT References: 1991Aug2.115241@ardor.enet.dec.com Sender: news@cernvax.cern.ch Lines: 52 In article <1991Aug2.115241@ardor.enet.dec.com> kannan@ardor.enet.dec.com (Nari Kannan) writes: > > Is anyone reading this newsgroup aware of research or development efforts in > the > following areas: > > 1.
